title.narrative: Emergency Food Assistance for victims of the flooding in La Mojana region

description.narrative:
... continued from Activities ...
ACH will store, pack and distribute the food at community level. Two distributions of 9 kg per person will be carried out (40 days between each distribution). Each individual food package will contain the following amounts: ? 6 kg of rice ? 1 kg of sugar ? 1 kg of oil ? 1 kg of lentils At the beginning of the operation, comprehensive beneficiary selection criteria will be worked out in partnership with ACH, in order to ensure that food delivery reaches the most vulnerable flood affected population.
a. Identify the most vulnerable zones and the ones that require the food assistance urgently. b. Distribute food rations to the affected population, mostly in rural areas, for 80 days either for take-home or community kitchens (shelters). c. Monitor and follow up the distribution.
